attributes.action: End the governments discrimination policy it has for people that still have to pay csa on the old system
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is to

Stop the government discriminating against people on the csa system pre 1999 and change all these case over to the new system 2011 before they put csa 2 2002 over because let's be honest 2002 & 2011 are the same system
